title: When Is a Coup Not a Coup? When the U.S. Says So.
description:
The Pentagon refuses to call the overthrow of Niger’s president a coup — a move that could affect military assistance and a U.S. drone base.

The post When Is a Coup Not a Coup? When the U.S. Says So. appeared first on The Intercept.

title: “Serial” Podcast's Adnan Syed Might Go Back to Prison Because of Toxic Maryland Politics
description:
The whiplash-inducing back and forth of the most viral true-crime case in recent memory might owe to disputes between local- and state-level officials.

The post “Serial” Podcast’s Adnan Syed Might Go Back to Prison Because of Toxic Maryland Politics appeared first on The Intercept.
